SENT.plain: Caffey disease or infantile cortical hyperostosis is a rare skeletal disorder with both sporadic and familial occurrence
The autosomal dominant familial form has been found to be a collagenopathy
The case being reported is a 7- month-old Indian boy with Caffey disease who was found to have the R1014C heterozygous mutation in the COL1A1 gene
This is the first mutation report of an Indian case with Caffey disease
